Text: Would recommend waiting for patch before downloading. Game is glitchy and stops story progression

Hey guys, for those who are having problems with the game locking up and sending you to your desktop, Under OPTIONS select the ADVANCED tab, and untick "Tesselation" especially NVIDIA users. Game plays great all the way through...
NVIDIA released a statement saying the game co. didn't release the code to them so they had no time to address the issue. Hope this works for you...
